p.k: A look at the career of Vivien Leigh, who scooped an Oscar as Scarlett O'Hara, famously married star Laurence Olivier and died of tuberculosis aged 53
The story of the actor renowned for his roles in gangster films The Public Enemy and White Heat, whose battles with the Hollywood studios changed

n.u: Andre Rieu: Welcome To My World

p.n: Andre Rieu: Welcome To My World (1)
p.k: Maastricht My Hometown Series exploring the world of Andre Rieu. With heart-warming interviews with Andre and magnificent performances
Memorabilia from the Space Race of the 1960s is being auctioned in New York, while over in London, author Jeffrey Archer is clearing out his art collection
Competition in which budding artists are challenged to paint a scene in four hours
Look-Alikes Important questions around identity are raised as the contestants must produce two portraits of celebrity lookalikes while capturing their true essence
Neck A young lady is cut down to size by her husband's loyal butler when it is discovered she is having an affair
Edward the Conqueror When Edward grows tired of his wife Louisa's obsession with a stray cat and decides to get rid of it, Louisa exacts her revenge

n.u: Why The Arts Matter: The South Bank Show

p.n: Why The Arts Matter: The South Bank Show (6)
p.k: Melvyn Bragg talks to Andria Zafirakou, a teacher at Alperton Community School and the 2018 Global Teacher Prize winner, about why the arts matter
A look at the career of Vivien Leigh, who scooped an Oscar as Scarlett O'Hara, famously married star Laurence Olivier and died of tuberculosis aged 53
The story of the actor renowned for his roles in gangster films The Public Enemy and White Heat, whose battles with the Hollywood studios changed
A Dip in the Pool An American gambler must come up with a cunning plan to slow down a ship at sea in order to win a bet
The Way Up To Heaven Mrs Foster exacts an intriguing revenge on her husband after his dawdling causes her to miss a flight
A Night At The Opera: It featured hits Bohemian Rhapsody and You're My Best Friend and propelled the band to superstardom. The story of how Queen created
Friends and fans of legendary British rock band Queen discuss their admiration for the award-winning quartet and reflect on their remarkable career and enduring hit songs
The AIDS Crisis A look at how the 1980s saw a mysterious and lethal illness known as AIDS develop into a pandemic with enormous political and cultural consequences
An intimate look at the life and career of John Wayne. Born Marion Morrison, the former football player would become one of the most iconic actors of the 20th century
Leading film critics discuss the career of Charlton Heston. After humble beginnings on stage, he took Hollywood by storm with starring in Ben-Hur and Planet of the Apes
Elvis Presley: Film revealing how the King created his seminal debut album. Sam Phillips, Keith Richards and BB King are among those discussing the album

p.n: Elvis And The Girl From Vienna
p.k: Trude Forsher was one of Elvis Presley's most trusted confidants in the 50s and this is her account of the King's rise to fame and the most iconic moments in his life
Documentary exploring the highs and lows of Elvis Presley's life, as told by the Memphis Mafia - a small group of Elvis's closest friends and confidants
Forty years on from his death, this entertaining documentary looks at the legacy of Elvis Presley through the lens of seven iconic stages of his life
Documentary capturing the sights and sounds of the pivotal year in Elvis's journey to become the King of Rock 'n' Roll. Features rare footage, photos and recordings

p.n: Elvis Presley: A Legend in Concert
p.k: Sensational collection of TV performances from The King. Featuring the notorious screen debut of his famous pelvic gyrations and the time Steve Allen

p.n: The Big Beat: Fats Domino and The Birth of Rock n Roll
p.k: This documentary traces how Fats Domino, who passed away in October 2017, paved the way for rock'n'roll with his own brand of New Orleans rhythm and blues
